Test Name: SEX-DETERMINING REGION Y (SRY) Yp11.3 Deletion, FISH
Specimen Type: Fixed peripheral blood or bone marrow cell preparations
Purpose: To detect the presence or absence of the SRY gene deletion at Yp11.3 via fluorescent in situ hybridization.
Container: Glass microscope slide pre-treated for FISH
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope with appropriate filter sets, humidified hybridization chamber, hotplate, 37 Â°C incubator
